item.title: MIUI OS1.0.4.0.UOPINXM Fastboot update for Redmi Note 14 Pro+ 5G India
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi Note 14 Pro+ 5G India

Codename: amethyst

Version: OS1.0.4.0.UOPINXM | 14.0

Size: 6.9 GB

MD5: 0f4d37d8aa0acb5c8d95161da65a6f81

Changelog:
[Attention]
System updates won't delete any of your data, but it's a good idea to back it up before updating, just in case.
The software update package will be deleted once the update is complete and won't occupy storage space on your device.
If you run into any issues, you can get help or share your feedback through the "Service & feedback" app.
Learn more about Xiaomi HyperOS in Xiaomi Community

Download: Here
